decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Design & Access Statement (dated 30/11/2021); Site Location & Block Plan (A-323-CZN-PL-000-PLN-LOC; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021); Existing and Proposed Site Plan (A-323-CZN-PL-001-PLN-Site; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021); Proposed Elevations (A-323-CZN-PL-021-ELE-Proposal; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021); Existing Plans (A-323-PL-010-PLN-Existing; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2020); Proposed Plans (A-323-PL-011-PLN-Proposal; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2020); Existing Elevations (A-323-CZN-PL-020-ELE; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021); Existing Sections (A-323-CZN-030-SEC; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021); Proposed Sections (A-323-CZN-031-SEC; Revision P1; dated 30/11/2021).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwelling, as per the submitted application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.

| The proposed new ground floor side window shall contain only obscure glass and non-opening unless the parts of the window can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the rooms in which the windows are installed. The windows so approved shall be retained permanently

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy D5 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); alteration to external elevation involving installation of window to side elevation
